name: TG-MANGA-BOT
description: Read manga from your favourites websites on telegram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value from @BotFather in telegram

CHANNEL.description: Channel that users must be subscribed in order to use the bot.

BOT_STATS_TEXT.description: Channel that users must be subscribed in order to use the bot.
BOT_STATS_TEXT.value: Hey there buddy,Join the following channels to get your manga and use me

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel that users must be subscribed in order to use the bot.

DATABASE_URL_PRIMARY.description: Will be used as database url. If not given heroku database will be used instead.
